programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction, (1987, Drama)
programme.desc: Michael Douglas plays Dan, a New York attorney who has a tryst with seductive Alex Forrest while his wife is away. Dan later shrugs off the affair as a mistake and considers it over. But Alex won't be ignored. Not now, not tomorrow, not ever.

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.

programme.title: Tears of the Sun, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: After a West African president's family is assassinated and civil unrest is rampant, a top-secret team is deployed to the far reaches of the jungle to rescue a U.S. doctor who is acting as a missionary.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: The Fisher King, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Parry, a homeless history professor, lives in a fantasy world full of castles, Red Knights and damsels in distress. Bridges co-stars as Jack, New York's #1 shock deejay, whose off-hand arrogance triggers a tragedy which ruins his career. Rated: R

programme.title: Julie & Julia, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Julie & Julia, tells the true stories of how Julia Child's life and cookbook inspired fledgling writer Julie Powell to whip up 524 recipes in 365 days and introduce a new generation to the magic of French cooking.

programme.title: Rachel Getting Married, (2008, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: When Kym, returns to the Buchman family home for the wedding of her sister Rachel, she brings a long history of personal crises, family conflict, and tragedy along with her. Rated -R

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: The Fantasticks, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: A charm-drenched period-piece musical based on the Broadway smash, "The Fantasticks" tells the story of a pair of potential young lovers (Jean Louisa Kelly, Joey McIntyre) whose romance is assisted/derailed by the machinations of their fathers.

programme.title: Marie Antoinette, (2006, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Written and directed by Academy Award winner Sofia Coppola, Marie Antoinette is an electrifying yet intimate re-telling of the turbulent life of history's favorite villainess. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: The Conspirator, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: From director Robert Redford comes the riveting true story behind the assassination trial of Abraham Lincoln – including the lone woman who was accused of plotting his murder.

programme.title: The Homesman, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Tommy Lee Jones stars in “the best western since UNFORGIVEN” (BBC). A low-life drifter helps a headstrong woman (Hilary Swank) cross the frontier after she rescues him from hanging.

programme.title: Damsel, (2018, Western)
programme.desc: A businessman travels West to join his fiancée in the mountains.

programme.title: Forsaken (2014), (2016, Action)
programme.desc: In 1872, an embittered gunslinger named John Henry Clayton attempts to make amends with his estranged father, Reverend Samuel Clayton, while their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers.

programme.title: Bone Tomahawk, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: When a group of cannibal savages kidnaps settlers from the small town of Bright Hope, an unlikely team of gunslingers, led by Sheriff Hunt (Kurt Russell), sets out to bring them home.

programme.title: Frank and Jesse, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: After the defeat of the South in the Civil War and the murder of their younger brother, Frank and Jesse James seek their own brand of justice. As outlaws, they gain fame for their daring hold-ups of banks, trains, and stagecoaches.

programme.title: Sweet Country, (2018, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Australian western set on the Northern Territory frontier in the 1920s, where justice itself is put on trial when an aged Aboriginal farmhand shoots a white man in self-defense and goes on the run as a posse gathers to hunt him down.

programme.title: Frontera, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Miguel (Michael Peña) is a hardworking father and devoted husband wrongfully accused of murdering the wife of a former sheriff (Ed Harris) after he illegally crosses the U.S. border.

programme.title: Geronimo: An American Legend, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: An American legend comes to life in this epic Western starring Jason Patric, Robert Duvall, Gene Hackman and Wes Studi as Geronimo, giving a stunning performance as the fearless warrior who was the last Indian leader to surrender to the white man.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: A mysterious event from Earth's past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet. Sam Witwicky and the Autobots must fight against the darkness to defend our world from the Decepticons.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Mean Girls, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Cady thinks she understands "survival of the fittest." However, the law of the wild takes a whole new meaning when the homeschooled 15-year-old enters public high school for the first time.

programme.title: The Green Hornet, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a slacker by day, party animal by night... until he finds a serious career that's seriously cool: crime-fighting action hero. As the Green Hornet, he teams up with gadget wiz and martial arts master Kato to take down LA's underworld.

programme.title: Airplane!, (1980, Comedy)
programme.desc: Voted “one of the 10 funniest movies ever made” by the American Film Institute, “Airplane!” is a masterpiece of off-the-wall comedy.

programme.title: Airplane II: The Sequel, (1982, Comedy)
programme.desc: There’s a mad bomber on board, the first lunar shuttle is about to self-destruct, the engines are not working, and-worst of all-the flight crew discovers they are completely out of coffee!

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Bandits, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: The suave Joe and his hypochondriac partner Terry have escaped from prison. Cutting a swath from Oregon through California, these fugitives rob banks in order to finance their scheme for a new life south of the Border.

programme.title: Airplane!, (1980, Comedy)
programme.desc: Voted “one of the 10 funniest movies ever made” by the American Film Institute, “Airplane!” is a masterpiece of off-the-wall comedy.

programme.title: Fargo, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Things go awry when car salesman Jerry Lundegaard (William H. Macy) hires two thugs to kidnap his wife. Soon, the very pregnant and chipper Police Chief Marge Gunderson (Frances McDormand) takes the case. Is she up for the challenge? You betcha.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: Bound, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Caesar’s a guy who launders money for the mob. What’s the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: Tank Girl, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: In this laugh-a-minute, futuristic Thriller, a mega-villain controls the world's water supply, and it's up to Tank Girl and her outrageous cohorts to end his greedy reign.

programme.title: Lifeforce, (1985, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: A frightening journey into the unknown awaits an Earthbound scout ship when it comes across an alien spacecraft of enormous proportions. Further investigation reveals a roomful of glass coffins containing the bodies of frozen creatures.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal, (1982, Fantasy)
programme.desc: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

programme.title: Labyrinth, (1986, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: Idle Hands, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: The devil will find work for idle hands to do, but what happens when he chooses the laziest teen slacker in the world to do his dirty work? Anton Tobias is a couch potato burn-out who can't control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand. Rated: R

programme.title: Cooties, (2015, Horror)
programme.desc: Teachers have the worst Monday ever when their students are turned into little killer savages in this horror comedy with unexpected laughs and unapologetic thrills.

programme.title: Winnie The Pooh: Blood and Honey, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: Winnie-The-Pooh: Blood and Honey follows Pooh and Piglet as they go on a rampage after Christopher Robin abandons them.

programme.title: Faceless After Dark, (2024, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.title: The Poughkeepsie Tapes, (2009, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: When hundreds of videotapes showing torture, murder, and dismemberment are found in an abandoned house, they reveal a serial killer's decade-long reign of terror and become the most disturbing collection of evidence homicide detectives have ever seen.

programme.title: P2, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: A woman who is the last to leave her office on Christmas Eve must rely on her wits to survive when she is trapped in a parking garage with a deranged security guard.

programme.title: Devon, (2024, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Years after Devon disappeared, a mysterious website draws five adventurers to the abandoned asylum where she was last seen. Armed with cameras, they plunge into the darkness, unaware they’re filming their own descent into horror—never meant to return.

programme.title: Hell House LLC., (2016, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Five years after an unexplained malfunction causes the death of 15 tour-goers and staff on the opening night of a Halloween haunted house tour, a documentary crew travels back to the scene of the tragedy to find out what really happened.

programme.title: Bornless Ones, (2017, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: With the help of her friends, Emily moves to a remote home to take better care of her brother, Zack who is diagnosed with cerebral palsy. But what they don't know is that the house kept a terrifying secret that will haunt them one by one.

programme.title: Winnie The Pooh: Blood and Honey, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: Winnie-The-Pooh: Blood and Honey follows Pooh and Piglet as they go on a rampage after Christopher Robin abandons them.

programme.title: Clue, (1985, Comedy)
programme.desc: Meet all the notorious suspects and discover all their foul play things. You'll love their dastardly doings as the bodies and the laughs pile up before your eyes. Featuring all three surprise endings!!

programme.title: Coming to America, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: High school senior, Ferris Bueller, decides to cut school and is determined to experience a day of pure freedom with his girlfriend and best friend in downtown Chicago before graduating.

programme.title: Footloose, (1984, Romance)
programme.desc: A rebellious city boy finds himself in an uptight Midwestern town where dancing and therefore all youthful joy has been banned.

programme.title: St. Elmo's Fire, (1985, Romance)
programme.desc: Seven friends, recent college graduates, are searching for a place in the real world, as they face issues of career and commitment. Rating: R

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off, (1986, Comedy)

programme.title: Mother, (1996, Comedy)

programme.desc: A firefighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky-but-sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving ever since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: A woman moves into a neighborhood where a group of husbands have transformed their wives into robots designed to cater to them. Remake of the 1975 feature.

programme.title: Four Brothers, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: Be Cool, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: John Travolta is back as Chili Palmer in this sequel to "Be Cool." With an all-star cast that includes Uma Thurman and The Rock, "Be Cool" is the hilarious tale about a gangster-turned-music-mogul...and what it takes to be number one with a bullet!

programme.title: Paid in Full, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience. Featuring the hit soundtrack with songs by Eric B. & Rakim, Boogie Down Productions, Guy, and Jay-Z.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.title: Four Brothers, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: Paid in Full, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience. Featuring the hit soundtrack with songs by Eric B. & Rakim, Boogie Down Productions, Guy, and Jay-Z.

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Planning to retire and begin a new life, Mr. X (Daniel Craig, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider), a successful West End drug dealer, has been asked for one last favor: to negotiate the sale of one million hits of Ecstasy. Rated: R

programme.title: Geronimo: An American Legend, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: An American legend comes to life in this epic Western starring Jason Patric, Robert Duvall, Gene Hackman and Wes Studi as Geronimo, giving a stunning performance as the fearless warrior who was the last Indian leader to surrender to the white man.

programme.title: Posse, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: There's action galore in this off-beat western that features a group of mostly black infantrymen who return from the Spanish-American War with a cache of gold. The men travel to the West where their leader searches for the men who lynched his father.

programme.title: Johnny Guitar, (1954, Western)
programme.desc: Gambling house operator Vienna seeks control of a town as archrival Emma Small sets out to force Vienna out of town. The timely arrival of Johnny Guitar thwarts Emma's dark plans, but doesn't prevent a showdown between the women.

programme.title: Outlaw Johnny Black, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Hell-bent on avenging the death of his father, Johnny Black vows to gun down Brett Clayton.

programme.title: Sukiyaki Western Django, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: In this action-packed Western, a nameless gunfighter arrives in a town ripped apart by rival gangs and, though courted by both to join, chooses his own path.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dollars, (1967, Action)
programme.desc: The Man With No Name (Clint Eastwood) receives offers from two gangs terrorizing a small town and accepts both, setting in motion a plan to destroy the criminals in a series of brilliantly orchestrated setups, showdowns, and deadly confrontations.

programme.title: For A Few Dollars More, (1967, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood returns as the Man With No Name, who teams up with equally lethal Colonel Mortimer (Lee Van Cleef) in pursuit of a sadistic killer and his band of desperadoes in this non-stop action classic from legendary director Sergio Leone.

programme.title: The Good, The Bad And The Ugly, (1967, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood portrays the invincible 'Man With No Name' in lethal pursuit of $200,000 in Confederate money alongside Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach in this renowned, influential, and classic cinematic western directed by the great Sergio Leone.

programme.title: The First Wives Club, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Join the Club - The First Wives Club, the good-time battle-of-the-sexes satire sparked by snappy one-liners, great physical-comedy gags and three unforgettable stars in top form, Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: Mo' Money, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: You can never be too rich...or too funny. Comedian Damon Wayans brings his rogue's gallery of outrageous characters to this action-filled comedy about a con artist who tries to go straight, but keeps getting pulled in the wrong direction.

programme.title: High School High, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: From the creators of the Naked Gun series comes High School High. Richard C. Clark is an idealisticyoung teacher who leaves a position at a prestigious school headed by his own father to teach at Marion Barry High.

programme.title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: Stan, Kyle, Kenny and Cartman sneak into an R-rated movie that warps their fragile minds. Soon their parents declare war on Canada and the guys are America's last hope to stop Armageddon.

programme.title: The First Wives Club, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Join the Club - The First Wives Club, the good-time battle-of-the-sexes satire sparked by snappy one-liners, great physical-comedy gags and three unforgettable stars in top form, Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: Mo' Money, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: You can never be too rich...or too funny. Comedian Damon Wayans brings his rogue's gallery of outrageous characters to this action-filled comedy about a con artist who tries to go straight, but keeps getting pulled in the wrong direction.

programme.title: High School High, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: From the creators of the Naked Gun series comes High School High. Richard C. Clark is an idealisticyoung teacher who leaves a position at a prestigious school headed by his own father to teach at Marion Barry High.

programme.title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: Stan, Kyle, Kenny and Cartman sneak into an R-rated movie that warps their fragile minds. Soon their parents declare war on Canada and the guys are America's last hope to stop Armageddon.

programme.title: The First Wives Club, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Join the Club - The First Wives Club, the good-time battle-of-the-sexes satire sparked by snappy one-liners, great physical-comedy gags and three unforgettable stars in top form, Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: King Kong, (1976, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

programme.title: The Warriors, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: The armies of the night number 100,000; they outnumber the police 5 to 1; and tonight they're after the Warriors.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: 40th Anniversary, (1974, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Five youths on a weekend getaway fall prey to a depraved family of cannibals in Tobe Hooper's masterpiece of subversive horror, now featuring a 4k digital transfer and all-new surround sound mix supervised by the director.

programme.title: A Boy And His Dog, (1975, Science fiction)
programme.desc: World War IV has ravaged Earth, and its survivors must battle for food, shelter and companionship in a post-atomic wasteland.

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood and Jeff Bridges lead a strong supporting cast in this offbeat crime caper about a colorful group of bank robbers determined to break into the fortress-like Montana Armored Depository.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: Superstar Clint Eastwood and director Don Siegel re-team for their fifth film in this fascinating account of the only three men ever to escape from the infamous maximum security prison at Alcatraz.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the critical Battle City showdown with the fate of the world at stake: Yami Yugi vs. Marik! If Yami Yugi loses, Yugi is taking a permanent vacation into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik proves his The Winged Dragon of Ra is the strongest Egyptian God Card by destroying Slifer the Sky Dragon! None of Yugi's cards can withstand its assault, but a gift from Kaiba may turn the duel around…

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi can't strike Marik's life points, and with every turn that passes, Marik is one step closer to taking down Yugi with a final strike from The Winged Dragon of Ra...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Yugi at the end of his ropes and the maniacal Marik waging all-out war, can Marik's oldest friend reach Marik in time to help him come to his senses before his insanity overwhelms him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Will the combined force of all of Yugi's monsters be enough to defeat an Egyptian God that terminated two other powerful Egyptian Gods? The fate of the world hangs in the balance with the finale of the Battle City Tournament!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: KaibaCorp Island is set to explode in mere minutes, but the blimp's engines are offline! Can Yugi and friends escape from the island in time, or will they sink to the bottom of the sea?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Téa and Serenity tour around the Town of Domino and reminisce about their friends' battles during Battle City, they learn how much they've grown and far they've come... and how far they have left to go!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian God Cards are stolen! A terrifying new villain emerges! Real monsters begin to appear around the world! Can Yugi and the gang discover how these strange events are connected before the planet is destroyed?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Seal of Orichalcos, not only can Gurimo have ten monsters at once, but each creature receives a power boost from Orichalcos's malevolent energies! Yugi better find a way to protect himself against Gurimo's horde!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only is our world on the brink of apocalypse, but an entire domain of monsters is also on the verge of collapse! Both Earth and the monster domain must unite and fight against the largest terror they have ever faced!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang set off on a cross-country trek when they're asked for help from a one-eyed former foe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba returns to Duelist Kingdom for a showdown against Pegasus! Will Kaiba discover the secret behind Pegasus's strategies before he loses his soul, just like he did on his first trip to Duelist Kingdom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only does Alister's fiend gain attack points for every fiery monster on the field, but it can also take control of Kaiba's monsters! Will Alister get his revenge, or will Kaiba get aid from the monster domain?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai's back to help Yugi take down Dartz and save the world from annihilation... or is a topsy-turvy twist in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has joined the enemy! Is she brainwashed, or is there some deeper reason for her unexpected transformation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Taking advantage of the Seal of Orichalcos, Mai coordinates her Harpie Ladies to whittle Joey's forces into waste! Is this the last we'll see of him, or will a legendary guardian recognize Joey as a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Joey transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer? Can Joey master the uncanny abilities of his new card to pound Mai's Harpie Ladies before they slash him to shreds?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Professor Hawkins has discovered startling connections between the world's conundrums, the Orichalcos stones and an ancient lost civilization.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a Wild West showdown between Yugi and his fiercest challenge yet: Rafael and his guardian monsters.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi calls on the legendary strength of Timaeus, but when it's not enough to crack Rafael's defense, will Yugi resort to desperate measures and go against everything he believes in to make the riskiest move of his life?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Using the abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Yugi grinds Rafael's guardians, but he's also succumbing to the card's evil influence. As darkness grows within his heart, the consequences of his non-heroic acts may be his undoing.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has captured Yugi's soul! Broken and unmotivated, how will our heroes ever rescue Yugi, especially when Dartz has a duo of nefarious new recruits ready to eradicate them?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: A cross-country expedition turns tragic when Dartz's new duelists separate Yugi from Joey in order to capture their souls separately.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Nothing will stop Weevil and Rex Raptor from quenching their thirst for revenge by capturing Yugi and Joey's souls!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost the trust of Timaeus, Yugi can no longer use his guardian dragon against Weevil's insect invasion. Discouraged and confused, Yugi has lost his dueling instincts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is on a vision quest where he must travel through a past of evil to find and conquer his greatest foe... himself.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is in no shape to duel... but Dartz doesn't care! Dartz sends out his ancient annihilator Orichalcos Soldier to finish Yugi once and for all.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Valon is ready to take on the world and fight... for the heart of Mai? And the first adversaries standing in his way are Duke and Rebecca!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel thirty thousand feet in the air as Alister squares off against Kaiba on top of an airplane.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Alister dispatches his airborne arsenal Air Fortress Ziggurat! How can Kaiba defeat a monster the size of the plane itself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has taken over KaibaCorp! Can Kaiba, with Yugi's help, break into his own company which he's protected with the latest in security technology?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With chaos running rampant, Valon separates Joey from his friends for a final showdown with Mai's heart on the line.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: With newfound allies won in the battle at Dressrosa, and as the Navy watches, Luffy and the Straw Hats depart Dressrosa for open water. But will Luffy accept the oath of allegiance given by his new fleet?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sons' Cups! The Straw Hat Fleet is Formed!

programme.title: While the Straw Hats are underway, Doflamingo has serious predictions for the upset of the world order! Meanwhile, the recent actions in Dressrosa have led to surprising results!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Numerous Rivals Struggle Amongst Themselves! The Raging Monsters of the New World

programme.title: While heading to the next island, Zou, Luffy's appetite causes them trouble and he and Bartolomeo find themselves entangled in the scheme of a pirate lord who can manipulate silver.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Silver Fortress! Luffy and Barto's Great Adventure!

programme.title: The Tram-Man arrives! And has Luffy, Bartolomeo and Desire on the run! The deeper the three fall into the pit, however, the more clear it becomes that Bill's group hides a terrible secret!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Underground Maze! Luffy vs. the Tram Human!

programme.title: Luffy, Bartolomeo, and Desire make their way up the mineshaft, but Bill's assassin, Peseta, has other plans! Just when the going gets tough, help arrives, and Zoro battles the assassin head on!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Sword Technique Heats Up! Law and Zoro Finally Appear!

programme.title: Luffy, Desire, and Bartolomeo go up against Bill! But the mad, Smelt-Smelt man becomes deranged and lets his true power unfurl! Do Luffy and the others have any hope of exposing Bill's self-serving aims and turning his gang against him?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Fights a Battle in Extreme Heat!

programme.title: Bartolomeo recounts the formation of the Straw Hats, sharing their moving story with the rest of his crew! Meanwhile, the mysterious island of Zou approaches in the distance, obscured by fog. But when the haze clears, no one is expecting what they see!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Curtain-up on a New Adventure! Arriving at the Phantom Island, Zou!

programme.title: Luffy and the others arrive at the mysterious land of Zou, and find the Sunny. But when they board, they find the other Straw Hats have already disembarked. Thus, Luffy, Zoro, Robin and the others take on the challenge of climbing the monstrous elephant!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The New Warlord! The Legendary Whitebeard's Son Appears!

programme.title: Finally scaling the elephant's back, the Straw Hats continue their search for the other half of their crew! But the mysterious "island" on the back of the elephant may hold more danger than they bargained for, as they learn they are not alone!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Elephant Climb! A Great Adventure on the Back of the Giant Elephant!

programme.title: Luffy pushes deeper into the mysterious forest on the elephant's back, but he's treading in territory where is not welcome! Meanwhile, Usopp and the others make a startling discovery in a ruined city!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle Begins! Luffy vs. the Mink Tribe!

programme.title: Luffy and the others survive the Rain-Ruption and learn of its vital role in maintaining life on Zou.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy and the others are unexpectedly welcomed at the fortress and treated well by the Minks, although they have to navigate some cultural differences… And Nami starts sharing what happened to them after they left Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Start to Counterattack! Great Moves by the Twirly Hat Crew!

programme.title: Luffy and the others learn about the dangerous intruders who have come to Zou, and why the island is wrecked! Afterwards, Luffy's loose lips get them into trouble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Threat Descends! The Beast Pirates, Jack!

programme.title: Duke Dogstorm - the Straw Hats finally meet the ruler of this strange land, and learn more about the battle that took place here; and the mysterious system by which the island is ruled!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Day! Duke Dogstorm Appears!

programme.title: Day turns to night as the Minks keep up their onslaught against the invading Beast Pirates! But Jack's amazing Devil Fruit power may end the elephant island once and for all!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Night! Master Cat Viper Emerges!

programme.title: Night and day, Jack faces the fury of the two sworn defenders of Zou, but while they put up a good fight, the Minks aren't able to subdue Jack, especially after he brings out his secret weapon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Exterminated Capital! The Twirly Hat Crew Arrive!

programme.title: In the aftermath of Jack's deadly attack on the island of Zou, Chopper and Sanji rush in to save the fallen Mink Tribe - but they will need the help of Caesar to overcome the poisonous effects of the gas!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Time Limit Closes in! The Bond Between the Mink Tribe and the Crew!

programme.title: More of the dramatic happenings on Zou are revealed as we learn that Jack's pirate band were not the only visitors to the elephant island! And what about the mysterious fate of Sanji?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Delinquent Comes Home! Emperor Big Mom's Assassins!

programme.title: The mystery of Sanji's disappearance deepens as Luffy learns that Big Mom's lackeys have caught up with him and the rest - and carry with them an invitation from Big Mom that simply can't be refused!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Truth Behind the Disappearance! Sanji Gets a Startling Invitation!

programme.title: Sanji's dire situation has become clear, but instead of rallying against Big Mom's crew, he submits to go along with them to bring an end to this situation. But being separated from one of his crew is more than Luffy is willing to tolerate!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To My Buds! Sanji's Farewell Note!

programme.title: There's only one key to finding out what happened to Sanji - and Luffy and the others make their way towards finding out more about their friend's disappearance, but on their way the indigenous fauna give them trouble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Let's Go and Meet Master Cat Viper!

programme.title: Luffy hatches a plan to help Sanji, but he'll have to go alone to avoid an all-out war with Big Mom. Meanwhile, Kin'emon and Kanjuro finally arrive at Zou, unwittingly setting the stage for the Minks' thirst for revenge!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy's Decision! Sanji on the Brink of Quitting!

programme.title: The samurai have landed! And they make their way into the country of Zou unaware of the welcome they will receive by the Minks!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Volatile Situation! The Dog and the Cat and the Samurai!

programme.title: Revelations abound as the true nature of the Wano clan and their relationship with the Minks is revealed! Momonosuke's role is greater than any had imagined! But even more shocking - the visage of Raizo the Ninja!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Third One! Raizo of the Mist, the Ninja, Appears!

programme.title: The mysteries of ninjutsu enthrall the Straw Hats as Raizo, the implausible ninja, makes his true powers known! Meanwhile, a mysterious artifact points the way towards the end of the Grand Line!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Red Stone! A Guide to the One Piece!

programme.title: The mystery of the Ponegliffs is revealed - their true significance, and the story of their creation, leads closer to the Straw Hats than they might have imagined!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the Land of Wano! The Kozuki Family and the Ponegliffs!

programme.title: More mysteries of the Kozuki Clan are revealed - and the samurai propose an alliance to help topple Kaido! But Luffy's response will shock the crew... and force the young daimyo to take responsibility!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Vow Between Two Men! Luffy and Kozuki Momonosuke!

programme.title: Dogstorm and Cat Viper share their story of being on the journey with Oden and Roger but are interrupted by Nami who is concerned about the sea route. Meanwhile, Jack is plotting to bring down the Mokomo Dukedom again!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legendary Journey! The Dog and the Cat and the Pirate King!

programme.title: The plans are set! The Straw Hats divide and conquer, one group heading to save Sanji, the others to the Land of Wano! But in the final moments before their departure, the tremendous elephant island begins to quake!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Nightmare Returns! The Invincible Jack's Fierce Attack!

programme.title: After being aggressively attacked by Jack's fleet, the monstrous Zunesha comes to life and beckons to those on its back! But can the Straw Hats understand its cry? And realize in time what the elephant island needs from them?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle to Defend Zou! Luffy and Zunesha!

programme.title: With the skirmish with Jack now over, the Straw Hats move on to trying to bandage the great elephant's wounds! But just as the whole island puts the plan into action, unseen danger lurks on horizon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save Zunesha! The Straw Hat's Rescue Operation!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and the others split up into four teams, each on different missions! Some from the Mink Tribe insist on leaving with Luffy's team! Meanwhile, Usopp makes a weapon for Nami that seems to work like magic!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Saying Goodbye and Descending from the Elephant! Setting Out to Take Back Sanji!

programme.title: Luffy's team sets out from Zou on their way to win back Sanji! But they didn't realize there is one more crewmember than they have bargained for!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Reverie! Princess Vivi and Princess Shirahoshi!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the golden death mask of Tutankhamen, the ancient Egyptian pharaoh known as the "boy king." However, when Lupin tries on the golden death mask he becomes possessed by an ominous curse.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Trans Europe Superexpress train has departed Venice and is headed to France. Onboard the Superexpress is crime boss Don Marcino's ill-gotten treasures. Can Lupin and his gang pull off the heist before the train reaches its destination?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin meets the grandson of master Ukiyoe artist, Toushusai Sharaku and learns that he has been switching his own works with his grandfather's originals. Unable to switch the last painting due to illness, he asks Lupin to switch it in his stead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko have been invited to a party hosted by Marcel Dulane, a member of Paris' high society. However, the elegant party turns out to be a trap. Fujiko is taken hostage and Lupin, with a time-bomb belt strapped to his waist…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Monaco to race his new toy in the Monaco Grand Prix. Or so he thought. Lupin ends up losing both his money and race car in a fixed poker game at the casino.
programme.sub-title: Bet on the Monaco Grand Prix!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A rare bottle of Bordeaux, commissioned by Napoleon for his beloved wife, Josephine, is to be given to the President of the United States as a Christmas present.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A criminal gang has hidden a microfilm containing the manufacturing process for artificial diamonds, developed by NASA, in one of Inspector Zenigata's molars. Determined to get his hands on that microfilm, Lupin must capture Inspector Zenigata.
programme.sub-title: The Great Chase in San Francisco

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Forward Hees, the world's richest man, suddenly dies a mysterious death and leaves a large ruby to Fujiko in his will. After inheriting the ruby, Fujiko comes down with the same mysterious fever as Hees…
programme.sub-title: Big Adventure of the Caribbean Sea

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A Count challenges Lupin to steal a gemstone named Dracula's Tear from on board his airship, the Hendenburg. However, also on board the ship are several formidable detectives: Homes III, Detective Archer, Koojisuke Kaneda and Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is suffering from Transformation Sickness, an illness that transforms him into a cruel, cold-blooded criminal at the stroke of midnight, and leaves him with no recollection of his murderous crime spree in the morning…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A small Arab nation has received a blackmail notice. Pay a $100 million or have their oil fields blown up. Lupin targets the money, but his plans are hindered when he finds out the culprits are using human bombs.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Black Panther, the world's largest emerald, gets its name from the black panther that appears inside it when a light shines on it at a particular angle. After capturing this one-of-a-kind emerald, Lupin hides it in a museum to retrieve it later…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vault maker Marukin Safe Company is forced into bankruptcy after Lupin cracks open their impenetrable safes. To test his own skills, Marukin's son challenges Lupin to open a safe he has designed…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: While trying to snag General Hatler's prize medallion, which contains a fifty-carat ruby, Lupin inadvertently reels in Hatler's biggest secret, his toupee! An enraged General Hatler orders Lupin and his gang to be killed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Upon returning to Japan, Goemon finds his master on the brink of death. Furthermore, Jinkuro, a fellow disciple, had stolen half of the scroll containing the Secret Arts of the Iga Ninja. Will Goemon be able to avenge his master?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are in a remote area pursing a mysterious treasure, when they save a woman being chased by hoodlums. The woman invites the two back to her sister's manor, which is full of beautiful women…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A mysterious woman who claims to be Fujiko's aunt, gives Lupin an ultimatum: Find Marshal Rommel's lost gold or die! First, Lupin must decipher the location of the gold, written in ancient hieroglyphs.
programme.sub-title: A Witch in the Fourth Dimension

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The great thief Nezumi-Kozou Jirokichi IV appears before Goemon and reveals that their ancestors competed in the first International Thieves Championship together, but were defeated by Lupin's grandfather, Arsène Lupin…
programme.sub-title: The Phantom Thief Rat Boy Appears

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The warden of an African prison is holding Fujiko captive. Lupin and his gang infiltrate the prison and attempt to break Fujiko out, but they become the target of the Iron Lizards, robotic devices developed to chase down fugitives!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Linda, a beautiful dancer, has stolen Jigen's heart and a vengeful Meyer has taken Fujiko hostage. Believing the women they love are in danger and unaware that Linda and Meyer are working together, Lupin and Jigen are set up to kill each other…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: According to legend, a stamp named the Cinderella Shadow is said to make its owner a princess. Lupin and his gang pull off the heist, but a girl name Alice who also wants the stamp tags along. Will the little girl get her royal wish?
programme.sub-title: Where did the Cinderella Stamp Go?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has sent a notice declaring he will steal all the cash from every bank in Paris. Detective Melon, the granddaughter of Inspector Garimard, is chosen to catch Lupin alongside Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has many secret techniques up his sleeve, and one of them is his Levitation Technique. In order to get their hands on this technique, a crime syndicate plots a dirty trick, where a fake Lupin tortures a man known as X8 and frames the real Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Inspector Zenigata get kidnapped and the two are forcibly conscripted into the Foreign Legion in Morocco. Lupin and Inspector Zenigata make a run for it, but not before they're shackled together at the neck.
programme.sub-title: The Wind in Morocco is Hot

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Beautiful Swedish twins, Latica and Anita, are engaged in a battle to the death over the Viking treasure map concealed on their backs. In disguise, Lupin learns the map's secret, but the map possesses an additional secret.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A hit has been ordered on Lupin and Puma, a formidable hitman who specializes in long-range attacks, is on his trail! Lupin takes his chances with a close range, one-on-one showdown against Puma, but the plan seemingly backfires and Lupin is shot…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Orion's Crown has been stolen and is up for grabs at a black-market auction. Lupin has his eyes on both the crown and the auction money, but first he must outsmart the other parties vying for the crown, including Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A two-thousand-year-old casket has been excavated. Inside the casket is Camilla, a beautiful woman in a near-death state, holding a golden statuette of the Virgin Mary. Lupin attempts to steal the golden statuette, but things don't go as planned…
programme.sub-title: Lupin Who Turned into a Vampire

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are attending a party in Africa, waiting for an opportunity to snatch a rare black pearl. However, their plan goes awry when a gang of gorillas crashes the party and steals the black pearl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Massive riches have been hidden inside Tsukikage Castle. Lupin and his gang must decipher a code to find out the whereabouts of this great treasure. Wii Lupin be able to locate the treasure before his rivals do?
programme.sub-title: Uncover the Secret of Tsukikage Castle

programme.title: Over the Horizon

programme.title: Pinkbike Academy
programme.desc: The remaining three mountain bikers compete in their final race of the competition.

programme.title: In the Zone

programme.title: Explorers

programme.title: Ultimate Mountain Athlete

programme.title: Departures
programme.desc: Scott and Justin meet up with a kiwi friend, with Justin's risk-taking side coming forward.

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Eric Hanson treks the Great Ocean Walk to the Twelve Apostles in Victoria, Australia.

programme.title: Epic Trails

programme.title: The Xtreme CollXtion

programme.title: The Xtreme CollXtion

programme.title: Learn

programme.title: Khanh Ong's Wild Food

programme.title: Adventure Cities

programme.title: Adventure Cities

programme.title: FOX SOUL Faceoff
